// uncomment the following to define a pipe made of copper
// define a rotation matrix that does nothing
// uncomment the following to place the pipe in the middle of the world
World Template.description: Standard world setup with example pipe

Logical Volume.description: Define a logical volume (using named solid)

Logical Volume (Inline Solid).description: Define a logical volume with an inline solid definition

Rotation Matrix (3 axes).description: Define a rotation matrix using angles around global X, Y, Z axes

Rotation Matrix (6 polar/azimuthal).description: Define a rotation matrix using 6 polar/azimuthal angles

Rotation Matrix (9 elements).description: Define a rotation matrix using 9 elements

Division by Number.description: Divide a volume by number of divisions

Division by Number and Width.description: Divide a volume by number and width

Check Overlaps.description: Enable overlap checking for a volume

Optical Property (GEARS).description: Define optical properties for a material (GEARS extension)

body: :surf ${1:name} ${2:vol1:copy1} ${3:vol2:copy2} type ${4|dielectric_dielectric,dielectric_metal,firsov,x_ray|} model ${5|unified,glisur|} finish ${6|polished,polishedfrontpainted,polishedbackpainted,ground,groundfrontpainted,groundbackpainted|} sigma_alpha ${7:0.1} property photon_energies ${8:count} ${9:energies} ${10:propertyName} ${11:values}
Optical Surface (GEARS).description: Define an optical boundary surface between two volumes (GEARS extension)
